storyInfo: While transporting medicine to Dossoles, Tequila and Catapult are ambushed by the Capit√°n's men as soon as they enter the city. The pair manage to escape, but the medicine is stolen with tactics similar to those of Team Rainbow.

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I believe I found a lead on that thing you asked me to look into.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Word around the casino is that a shipment of Oripathy suppressants is being delivered to that artist community. There are a lot of Infected in there. If we can stop the shipment, maybe...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Who's delivering it?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: A pharmaceutical company by the name of Rhodes Island. It has a bit of a reputation in Dossoles and is linked to Lady Candela... is it dangerous?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Dangerous...? Let me think...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: By the way, did you get anything on the men who showed up at Reynell's office the other day?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sorry, sir, we tried, but we couldn't find anything...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: What about our old rivals? The people behind them?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Nothing there either.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Are you telling me they just dropped from the sky?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Maybe someone doesn't want us digging up their background?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Then who is that someone?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Ah... I see... why didn't I think of it?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: What if it's in the Coalition government itself? Plenty of people would love to have my job.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Perhaps even someone who's spent a lot of time under me... what do you think?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: A-Absolutely not! I've always been loyal to you, and to you alone! I swear!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Now that I think of it, you wouldn't have the guts.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Y-You're absolutely right!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Well, I have my hands full with what's in front of me, anyway... is there a way to kill two fowlbeasts with one stone?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Teach those gangs in the community a lesson, while taking those people down a peg...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: What do you remember about their tactics that day?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I thought you had to wait in the customs line for a long time.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It helps that I know the customs officer. I actually borrowed this car from him.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I didn't know you had so many friends here.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Let's get the meds delivered, then we can find a beach to lie down and relax.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: There's no rush. It's a very interesting neighborhood that we're headed to. I think you'll like it.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: A lot of them are engaged in very special creative, spiritual activities, expressing their sentiments about life and everything around them through unique language and media.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I'm feeling a little confused... could you put it in a simpler way?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: There are a lot of artists there.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Everything is in place, sir.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Don't worry, sir, we're properly dressed, and we've memorized the phrases that they used.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Reenacting their accents and tactics won't be easy, but we've got a former Blacksteel guy here who'll take point.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: We've handed out the guns, as well as Originium explosives and launchers.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Yes, the medicine first, and the fewer people around the better. I know, leave witnesses alive.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I've got this, sir, no worries.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: They're one block away, sir.
attributes.name: Gun-Wielding Soldier

attributes.content: Move, move!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Ernesto, what's that in the middle of the road?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Maybe someone dropped it. We'll just go around.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Wait‚Äîit's an Originium explosive!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: A what?!
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: No time to brake. Jump!
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The medicine!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It's in a special container. It should survive the explosion... hopefully...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Can you stand?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Just a little scratch.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: They're running towards the car!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Guys! There's no one inside! We're here!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: No response.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Is it just me, or do they look more like mercenaries than tourists?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: They could have something to do with that explosion. Let's go‚Äî
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The men find what they need in the car and run away before Tequila can finish.
The remaining men point their guns at Catapult and Tequila.
Guns?!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Who are they, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That's what I want to know.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Why are you after the meds?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Open fire!
attributes.name: Squad Leader

attributes.content: Damn‚Äî
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto, get down!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Engaging! Six o'clock!
attributes.name: Squad Leader

attributes.content: Fire! Fire! Keep them pinned down!
attributes.name: Squad Leader

attributes.content: Are you okay, Arleta?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I'm fine. Only one of them is actually shooting properly. The others are just popping launchers‚Äî
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Reloading! Cover me!
attributes.name: Gun-Wielding Soldier

attributes.content: Twelve o'clock... our man down...
attributes.name: Gun-Wielding Soldier

attributes.content: Too many of them. We can't reach the meds.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Let's get to the alley over there. There's a way out that way.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Whisper) Gotcha. I'll cover you.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Whisper) Ten meters, five meters, three meters... Arleta!
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The street art community? Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Cautious Passerby

attributes.content: I'm interested in the arts festival on this flyer.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I wouldn't go there if I were you. They aren't people you want to mess with.
attributes.name: Cautious Passerby

attributes.content: I agree. There are a lot of Infected there.
attributes.name: Timid Taxi Driver

attributes.content: Infected? Are they sick?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Are you kidding me?
attributes.name: Timid Taxi Driver

attributes.content: No one will show us the way. It sounds like a dangerous place. Are we still going?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Taxis won't even take us there.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Maybe we should report back to Ela and go together with the others.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Look what we've got here. The perfect angle, subject and expression. A true work of art.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: Did you just take our photo without permission, sir?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Give me the camera, please.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Come now, handsome, don't get angry, take a look. I guarantee you'll love it.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: The screen shows the duo frowning at the taxi driving away, as though bothered by its wake, one putting her hands on her hips in frustration, the other covering his nose.
A snapshot of everyday life at its most amusing, condensed into a single picture.
Pff... that's not bad.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: You do have a good eye.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I'm glad you like it. Fifteen gold certificates, or equivalent in soles or ducats. I'm not picky.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: I'm afraid we have no intention of buying it. And you'll have to delete it as well. We don't want our image to end up somewhere we wouldn't expect.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Well, if you want it deleted... twenty gold certificates, not a penny less.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: We're not paying.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Well, we're not deleting anything unless you pay up.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: Bastard.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm a rascal alright. Problem?
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: He's getting away!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Keep your eyes open for your photos out there! Adios, amigos!
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: *French swearing*, he's too fast!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Not to worry, Kateb. He left a long trail of tire marks behind.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I've been looking for you. Is your photo portfolio ready?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Just making a couple of quick bucks. Don't worry, I'll have it ready tonight.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: You always leave it to the last minute.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I'll buy you fruit soda to make up for it.
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: Forget that, just get your photos ready by tonight, or I'll break your nose.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Ha. See ya!
attributes.name: Street Photographer

attributes.content: We're going to lose him... that girl is in the way.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We have to think of something.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: They peek out from behind cover to see the girl pick up a spray can and begin spraying graffiti on the alley walls.
(Whisper) Don't tell me... has she noticed us?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: (Whisper) What do you mean?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: (Whisper) Look at the way she's turning to the left and wincing... is she communicating with someone?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: (Whisper) It's possible... their ears work differently. Maybe they can hear us, even when we try to be quiet.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Damn... why now...? Argh...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Did she just collapse?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: She's ill!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Meijer, keep watch!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Be careful‚Äî
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What's going on, Kateb?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: You're really frowning.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Doc crouches down and examines the girl.
A strange expression comes over his face, and his brows furrow even deeper.
What is it?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Doc picks up the fallen spray can while covering his mouth and nose.
I'm guessing this can hasn't passed inspection.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I'm not sure you can get knocked out by spraypaint, even if it's poorly made.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I don't know... I can only do what I can.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Are you feeling better, girl?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Injector... in my pocket...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Let's see... this one?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: (Nods slowly)...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Good thing you have your own medication, otherwise there wouldn't be much I could do to help you.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I thought maybe the spraypaint fumes knocked you out.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Ha... I smell it every day... it's nothing.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You already look much better.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: That's my last one...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Here, have some water.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Where do you live, girl? We'll take you home.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Don't call me 'girl'...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You're not afraid of me?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I'm from Paris. I've seen my share of street gangs.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Gangs? That's not what I'm talking about.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Then what is it?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Huh? You're kind of a weirdo...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: The girl lifts the gauze from her right leg, revealing the Originium crystals on her knee.
Aren't you scared of this?
attributes.name: Tecno
